A project focused on implicating the Hexoseamine Biosynthetic Pathway and *O*-GlcNAcylation in AML. *Publication Pending* ---- ## Sorting Students into Random Groups Code on GitHub
A simple project to make a CLI and GUI to sort students into groups using Rust. The purpose was: - I wanted for someone to be able to run this without having R or Python installed, - I wanted to learn a little bit of a compiled language, and - My fiance√© had a use for such a utility.
